{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$31.0M in 2021-2022** on contracts with GC STRATEGIES.

Across 110 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 37 have at least one amendment (34%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 232% and the average number of amendments was 1.95. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$28.2M over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 1.07 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$687.3K. The longest contract was 5.87 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$9.2M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
